{{Infobox CHL season | title = 1992â93 MetJHL season | colour = #007AC2 | colour text = #FFFFFF | league = [[Metro Junior A Hockey League]] | league abr = MetJHL | logo = | duration = '''Regular season'''
1992-09 â 1993-02
'''Playoffs'''
1993-02 â 1993-05 | champions = [[Wexford Raiders]] | no of teams = 13 | commissioner = | prev year = [[1991â92 MetJHL season|1991â92]] | next year = [[1993â94 MetJHL season|1993â94]] }} The '''1992â93 MetJHL [[Season (sports)|season]]''' is the [[List of OJHL seasons|2nd]] season of the [[Metro Junior A Hockey League]] (MetJHL). The 13 teams of the Fullan and Bauer Divisions competed in a 48-game schedule. The top 6 teams in each division made the playoffs. The winner of the MetJHL playoffs, the [[Wexford Raiders]], could not proceed further in the National playdowns as the MetJHL was not a member of the [[Ontario Hockey Association]]. However, the Raiders were permitted to play a 2-game series for charity against the [[OJHL|OHA's Central Junior League]]'s champion, the [[Barrie Colts]]. The Raiders won both games. ==Changes== *[[Aurora Tigers|Aurora Eagles]] join MetJHL from [[OJHL|CJBHL]]. *Mimico Monarchs move and become the [[Richmond Hill Riot]]. *Thornhill Thunderbirds move and become the [[Mississauga Senators]]. *Richmond Hill Rams move and become the [[North York Rangers]]. ==Final standings== ''Note: GP = Games played; W = Wins; L = Losses; OTL = Overtime Losses; SL = Shootout Losses; GF = Goals For; GA = Goals Against; PTS = Points; x = clinched playoff berth; y = clinched division title; z = clinched conference title'' {| cellpadding="0" |- align="left" Thunderbirds|Weston Dodgers]] || 48 || 15 || 27 || 6 || 203 || 253 || 36 |} |} ==1992-93 MetJHL Playoffs== '''''Preliminary''''' :'''[[Aurora Eagles]]''' defeated [[Bramalea Blues]] ''3-games-to-1'' :'''[[Richmond Hill Riot]]''' defeated [[Kingston Voyageurs]] ''3-games-to-none'' '''''Quarter-final''''' :'''[[Muskoka Bears]]''' defeated [[Aurora Eagles]] ''4-games-to-2'' :'''[[St. Michael's Buzzers]]''' defeated [[Mississauga Senators]] ''4-games-to-2'' :'''[[Wexford Raiders]]''' defeated [[Richmond Hill Riot]] ''4-games-to-none'' :'''[[Wellington Dukes]]''' defeated [[North York Rangers]] ''4-games-to-none'' '''''Semi-final''''' :'''[[St. Michael's Buzzers]]''' defeated [[Muskoka Bears]] ''4-games-to-none'' :'''[[Wexford Raiders]]''' defeated [[Wellington Dukes]] ''4-games-to-none'' '''''Final''''' :'''[[Wexford Raiders]]''' defeated [[St. Michael's Buzzers]] ''4-games-to-1'' ==Exhibition Series vs. [[OJHL|CJAHL]]== The [[Barrie Colts]] of the [[OJHL|OHA's Central Junior A League]] and the [[Wexford Raiders]] of the Metro League played a pair of exhibition games head-to-head for charity. The purpose of the games was to match the probably champions of the two leagues head-to-head to see where each league's talent level stood if the OHA was to allow both leagues in as sanctioned Junior A leagues for the 1993-94 season. Wexford won both games by narrow margins, but the second game was marred by an incident involving a fight, initiated by the [[Barrie Colts]], that spilled into the crowd. :'''[[Wexford Raiders]]''' defeated [[Barrie Colts]] ([[OJHL|CJAHL]]) 7-6 :'''[[Wexford Raiders]]''' defeated [[Barrie Colts]] (CJAHL) 4-3 ==Players selected in [[1993 NHL Entry Draft]]== *''Rd 4 #97'' '''[[John Jakopin]]''' - [[Detroit Red Wings]] ([[St. Michael's Buzzers]]) *''Rd 8 #195'' '''[[Thom Cullen]]''' - [[New Jersey Devils]] ([[Wexford Raiders]]) *''Rd 8 #198'' '''[[Travis Dillabough]]''' - [[Los Angeles Kings]] ([[Wexford Raiders]]) ==See also== * [[1993 Centennial Cup]] * [[Dudley Hewitt Cup]] * [[List of Ontario Hockey Association Junior A seasons]] * [[Ontario Junior Hockey League]] * [[Northern Ontario Junior Hockey League]] * [[1992 in ice hockey]] * [[1993 in ice hockey]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.ojhl.pointstreaksites.com/ Official website of the Ontario Junior Hockey League] * [http://cjhlhockey.com/ Official website of the Canadian Junior Hockey League] {{-}} {{Start box}} {{Succession box | before = [[1991â92 MetJHL season]] | after = [[1993â94 MetJHL season]] | title = [[List of Ontario Hockey Association Junior A seasons|Ontario Hockey Association
